article.title: DRS Snags Special Operations Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: DRS Systems Incorporated, Parsippany, New Jersey, was awarded an estimated $40,218,000 five-year indefinite-delivery/indefinite-quantity contract with firm-fixed-price delivery orders for the purchase of Spot on Target in support of U.S. Special Operations Command Procurement Division.Â U.S. Special Operations Command, MacDill Air Force Base, Florida, is the contacting activity.
